classes

Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.Transaction

  • public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows the construction of the Transaction object that will allow the user to see what type of transaction has been done, by whom, to what company, at which price and what amount
    Author:
    carlosgrivera

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BUY 
      static int SELL 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Transaction object Constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAmount()
      get the amount of shares involved in the transaction
      int getBuyOrSell()
      gets the type of transaction that was made
      java.lang.String getCompanySymbol()
      gets the symbol of the company involved in the transaction
      java.util.Date getDate()
      gets the date at which the transaction was done
      double getPrice()
      gets the price of the shares involved in the transaction
      int getShareholderId()
      gets the id of the shareholder involved in transaction
      void split()
      duplicates the number of shares that the company has, assigns new value to each share equal to one half of the original value
      java.lang.String toString()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Transaction

        public Transaction(int buyOrSell,
                   int shareholderId,
                   java.lang.String companySymbol,
                   int amount,
                   double price,
                   java.util.Date date)
        Transaction object Constructor
        Parameters:
        buyOrSell - option of buying or to selling
        shareholderId - shareholder that performed a transaction
        companySymbol - the symbol of the company involved in transaction
        amount - amount being sold or bought
        price - price at which the shares were bought or sold
        date - the date at which the transaction was done
